title: Report Not Loading
description: A user reports that a specific report is timing out and not loading, while other reports work fine.

tasks.description: Ask the user for the parameters of the report they are trying to run (e.g., date range, filters).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the user is running a report with a very large date range (3 years).

tasks.description: Hypothesize that the large query size is causing the timeout.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the likely cause.

tasks.description: Advise the user to run the report in smaller date chunks (e.g., quarterly) to avoid timeouts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a workable solution to the user.
